method.name: get_arrays
method.description: Returns an [Array] that can be used as the [code]arrays[/code] parameter in [method ArrayMesh.add_surface_from_arrays] with [constant Mesh.PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLES]. The [Array] contains data at the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_VERTEX] index. The [Array] may contain data at the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_NORMAL] index if [code]enable_normals[/code] was [b]true[/b] in [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.initialize]. The [Array] may contain data at the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_CUSTOM0] index if [code]semantic_label_set[/code] was [b]true[/b] in [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.initialize].

method.name: get_bounds
method.description: Get the global bounds of the mesh as a [Vector3] where [code]x[/code], [code]y[/code], [code]z[/code] correspond to the width, height, and depth, in meters, of a bounding box centered and oriented at [method get_transform].

method.name: get_indexed_arrays
method.description: Returns an indexed [Array] that can be used as the [code]arrays[/code] parameter in [method ArrayMesh.add_surface_from_arrays] with [constant Mesh.PRIMITIVE_TRIANGLES]. The [Array] contains data at the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_VERTEX] index. The [Array] contains data at the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_INDEX] index. The [Array] may contain data at the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_NORMAL] index if [code]enable_normals[/code] was [b]true[/b] in [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.initialize]. The [Array] may contain data at the [constant Mesh.ARRAY_CUSTOM0] index if [code]semantic_label_set[/code] was [b]true[/b] in [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.initialize].

method.name: get_indexed_vertex_semantics
method.description: An [Array] of [enum SemanticLabel]s, which is identical to indexing the [Array] from [method get_indexed_arrays] at [constant Mesh.ARRAY_CUSTOM0]. [b]NOTE:[/b] This [Array] is always empty when [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.initialize] was called with [constant OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.SEMANTIC_LABEL_SET_NONE].

method.name: get_last_update_time
method.description: Get the time when the submesh was last updated.

method.name: get_submesh_id
method.description: Get the UUID for this mesh. This UUID can be used as a key for the [Dictionary] returned by [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.get_submesh_data].

method.name: get_transform
method.description: Get the global [Transform3D] of the center and orientation of the mesh.

method.name: get_update_state
method.description: Get the state of the mesh.

method.name: get_vertex_semantics
method.description: An [Array] of [enum SemanticLabel]s, which is identical to indexing the [Array] from [method get_arrays] at [constant Mesh.ARRAY_CUSTOM0]. [b]NOTE:[/b] This [Array] is always empty when [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.initialize] was called with [constant OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.SEMANTIC_LABEL_SET_NONE].

constants.constant: The submesh is unchanged since the last call to [method OpenXRAndroidSceneMeshing.get_submesh_data]. [b]NOTE:[/b] [method get_transform] may have changed; the array data (vertices, indices, etc) are not changed.
The submesh's array data (vertices, indices, etc) have changed.
A vertex is for something else.
A vertex is for a floor.
A vertex is for a ceiling.
A vertex is for a wall.
A vertex is for a table.
